analysis.description:
StandardToken.recoverLost (/unique_chucks/38/0x26dee175b1fbc390fca7e689e6cd1543580175a2.sol#387-394) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-this.transfer(lost,amount) (/unique_chucks/38/0x26dee175b1fbc390fca7e689e6cd1543580175a2.sol#393-394)

BasicToken.constructor.totalSupply (local variable @ /unique_chucks/38/0x26dee175b1fbc390fca7e689e6cd1543580175a2.sol#192-195) shadows:

	- ERC20Basic.totalSupply (function @ /unique_chucks/38/0x26dee175b1fbc390fca7e689e6cd1543580175a2.sol#155-156)
